text: The 1895–96 Yale Bulldogs men's basketball team represented Yale University in intercollegiate basketball during the 1895–96 season. The team finished the season with an 8–5 record and was retroactively named the national champion by the Premo-Porretta Power Poll. ==Schedule and results== |- !colspan=9 style=| Regular season ==References== Category:Yale Bulldogs men's basketball seasons Yale Category:NCAA Division I Men's Basketball Tournament championship seasons Yale Bulldogs Men's Basketball Team Yale Bulldogs Men's Basketball Team
title: 1895–96 Yale Bulldogs men's basketball team
